Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: GHC.Types.Module{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module Liquid.Prelude.Totality_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import Control.Exception.Base
 6: 
 7: {-@
 8: measure totalityError :: a -> Bool
 9: 
10: assume Control.Exception.Base.patError :: {v:GHC.Prim.Addr# | totalityError "Pattern match(es) are non-exhaustive"} -> a
11: 
12: assume Control.Exception.Base.recSelError :: {v:GHC.Prim.Addr# | totalityError "Use of partial record field selector"} -> a
13: 
14: assume Control.Exception.Base.nonExhaustiveGuardsError :: {v:GHC.Prim.Addr# | totalityError "Guards are non-exhaustive"} -> a
15: 
16: assume Control.Exception.Base.noMethodBindingError :: {v:GHC.Prim.Addr# | totalityError "Missing method(s) on instance declaration"} -> a
17: 
18: assume Control.Exception.Base.recConError :: {v:GHC.Prim.Addr# | totalityError "Missing field in record construction"} -> a
19: @-}
